ComicInfo.Summary:
A Nightmare on Elm Tree: DP is asked to retrieve a little girl's cat that is stuck in a tree and ends up taking a psychedelic head trip in the process.
Too Many Deadpools: Zeus creates a host of new Deadpools to serve as his entertainment.
Mouth of the Border: Deadpool is asked to save his friend's favorite goat from a pack of vicious goat suckers.
Canada, Man!: The Canadian government asks Deadpool to lead their new national super hero team.
Marvel Bromance Comics Presents: No Longer in a Relationship: Dr. Doom drops Deadpool from his friends list after being forced to read DP's terrible weekly web comic.
Today I Am Da Man!: The young son of an old criminal buddy hires Deadpool to appear at his Bar Mitzvah in order to publicly take out his much hated, soon-to-be step father
A Week in the Life of Deadpool: A week in the life of Deadpool (underground comix style).
Silentest Night: The Deadpool Corps are holding a memorial for the deceased Avengers when a large striped planet appears in the sky and starts raining berets on earth. When berets resurrect a few of the Avengers as undead mimes, battle ensues. Things get tricky when a beret falls on Deadpool himself, turning him into a silent, yet dexterous agent of violence.
Appetite for Destruction: Deadpool is searching for a missing young man when he is captured by a pack of loquacious vampires who plan on fattening him up for dinner.
The Maltese Bunny: Deadpool dreams he is the star of a crazy version of The Maltese Falcon with the Mandarin's rings hidden in a chocolate bunny being the ultimate prize.
Luck Be a Lady: Deadpool is playing poker in Vegas when a beautiful woman sidles up to the table and begins to guess which of his opponents is his latest target.
